title: Cupcake
description: After she turns down a marriage proposal from Shrimp and he moves back to New Zealand with his parents, Cyd tries to restart her life in New York City at her half-brother's apartment, but just as she begins to settle in, Shrimp returns, old feelings are reignited, and important decisions will need to be made with little time to spare. $100,000 ad/promo.
author: Rachel Cohn
